channel.title: CVE Feed for TeamViewer -- Remote (Full Client)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TeamViewer -- Remote (Full Client)

item.title: CVE-2024-2451|2024-08-01T19:11:53.533Z -- teamviewer -- remote%20%28full%20client%29
item.description: Improper fingerprint validation in the TeamViewer Client (Full & Host) prior Version 15.54 for Windows and macOS allows an attacker with administrative user rights to further elevate privileges via executable sideloading.
